Description.Text: All apartments, double or triple, with fridge, TV, fully equipped kitchenette, bathroom with shower, air conditioning, balcony, internet. There is also a large garden beside the pool and private parking. Children find the space they need to play comfortably and safely.

Ligia, a beautiful village, 6 km from the town of Lefkada to the East of the island. About 40 meters from the sea and the distance from the main road is about 150 meters, impress the peace and tranquility that prevails in the green surroundings of the accommodation.
